summary: When a US soccer team gets stranded on a deserted island after a plane crash they must face difficult choices to survive. Modern day Lord of the Flies.
cast: Nate Parker|Grant Alan Ouzts|James Remar|Eva Jenickova|Jessica Lowndes|Leore Hayon|Eugene Simon|Diego Boneta|Ethan Peck|Joey Pollari|Ryan Mulkay|Brad Schmidt|Rob Mayes|Sung Kang|Michael Cardelle|Mario Casas|Matt Testro|Tracy Ryerson|Daniel Stewart|Devin Kirtz|Seth Michaels|Chineden Udengwu|Zak Tanjeloff|Naomi Natelina Chandrasegar|Shahin Perakshon|Pedram Fotouchivehpour|Soruoh Aliashghar|Adil Azhar Ibrahim|Shayan Dorakhshan|Vahid Setavei|Evazalcmane|Damien Amey|Cassandra Bautista|Jason Brye|Alejandro Cardenas|Leonel Claude|Billynaire Cruz|Jules Abel Logel|Nicole Pedra|Melissa Quintas
title: Eden
